EmailTemplate.subject: EuroShop 2022: No more guessing about store modernization
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Imagine where you could take your brand if you could take the complexity and the guesswork out of store modernization. NCR is helping retailers around the world achieve goals like these. It starts with our retail innovations, like edge virtualisation, that help you modernise your stores without an IT overhaul. And when it’s time to upgrade? You can upgrade your entire estate at one time – instead of lane by lane, device by device—all with the store technology you already have. So you can bring new features to market fast and at a lower cost. And that’s just one of our innovations. Plan ahead to visit us at Stand 10/A04 to see other innovations that will help you meet the future of digital retailing with confidence.
